content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in reaching an affordable agreement. Currently considering other options but drawn to this apartment's location. Hoping to find a competitive price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your interest in the location. Let's keep negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my financial situation and other available options, I'm seeking a reduction in the monthly rent by at least 50 Euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: [500] Euros per month is too low for this apartment. I can consider [550] Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While appreciating your flexibility, I believe [530] Euros would be more suitable for my budget, considering my other possibilities.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: [530] Euros per month is acceptable. I agree to the price of [530] Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
